name: No-Bake Chocolate Oat Cookies
description: Chewy, fudgy cookies made with oats, cocoa, and peanut butter â€” no oven required!
steps: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, milk, and cocoa powder. Bring to a boil for 1 minute.
Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter until melted.
Add oats and mix until well coated.
Spoon onto parchment paper and let cool until firm.
